alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 8:32PM EDT until May 01 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Lexington County in central South Carolina... Central Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 832 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Bank, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Springdale, St. Andrews, Red Bank, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Columbia International University, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Five Points, Cayce Riverwalk and Guignard Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 50 and 68. Interstate 26 between mile markers 106 and 123. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 7. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
